fields.summary: Create source mapping for .JS files currently unsupported by the Debugger

components.name: Tooling
components.description: Items related to Alloy tooling and workflow

fields.description:
As reported by Fokke, the change for ALOY-616 causes the source mapper to attempt to create source maps for non-JavaScript files (such as .DS_Store) which causes a compilation error.

PR here https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/pull/466
fields.summary: Source mapping of non-controller files should ignore non-JavaScript files

comments.body: Tested the PR, approved and merged.

Test sample added: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile_tests_internal/tree/master/Alloy/JIRA/ALOY-1065
Sample project compiled/run and debugger works as expected on iOS, Android and Mobileweb.

TiSDK 3.4.0.v20140913174915 
Appcelerator Studio 3.4.0.201409131030
CLI 3.4.0-rc3
Alloy 1.5.0-rc2
Xcode6 GM

Closing.
